name: Ultraball
description:
Join our discord to be part of our Closed Beta! https://discord.gg/HNACKmbSrw

Ittttttssss Ultraball! The fast paced, high flying, beat em up sports game, now with lasers! Strategize and communicate as you work together to score on the opposing team! Level up and distribute your stat points to create the ultimate Ultraballer. Tune your stats and create different loadouts to suit your playstyle.
Win games and get the golden glory for Gob!
